description.english: Launch the game for the first time!
description.german: Spiel das Spiel zum ersten Mal!
description.french: Lancez le jeu pour la première fois !
description.italian: Lancia il gioco per la prima volta!
description.spanish: ¡Juega por primera vez!
description.dutch: Start het spel voor de eerste keer!
description.swedish: Starta spelet för första gången!
description.brazilian: Execute o jogo pela primeira vez!

displayName.english: The Man With the Martian Gun
displayName.brazilian: O homem com a arma marciana

description.english: Get the Zapper.
description.german: Hol dir die Laserpistole.
description.spanish: Consigue la pistola láser
description.french: Obtenez le Zapper.
description.italian: Prendi la Pistola laser.
description.dutch: Krijg de Stroomstoter!
description.brazilian: Pegue o Zapper.
description.swedish: Skaffa zapparen.

description.english: Survive spring!
description.german: Überlebe den Frühling!
description.spanish: ¡Sobrevive a la primavera!
description.french: Survivez au printemps.
description.italian: Sopravvivi alla primavera!
description.dutch: Overleef de lente!
description.brazilian: Sobreviva à primavera!
description.swedish: Överlev våren!

description.english: Survive summer!
description.german: Überlebe den Sommer!
description.spanish: ¡Sobrevive al verano!
description.french: Survivez à l'été.
description.italian: Sopravvivi all'estate!
description.dutch: Overleef de zomer!
description.brazilian: Sobreviva ao verão!
description.swedish: Överlev sommaren!

description.english: Survive fall!
description.german: Überlebe den Herbst!
description.spanish: ¡Sobrevive al otoño!
description.french: Survivez à l'automne.
description.italian: Sopravvivi all'autunno!
description.dutch: Overleef de herfst!
description.brazilian: Sobreviva ao outono!
description.swedish: Överlev hösten!

description.english: Repel the Martian threat for good!
description.german: Schlag die Marsianer ein für alle Mal zurück!
description.spanish: ¡Expulsa definitivamente a los marcianos!
description.french: Repoussez définitivement la menace Martienne !
description.italian: Respingi per sempre la minaccia del Marziani!
description.dutch: Hef de marsmanbedreiging voorgoed op!
description.brazilian: Afugente os marcianos para sempre!
description.swedish: Avvärj marsianhotet för gott!

description.english: Save all the cows on every Story level of spring.
description.german: Rette im Story-Modus alle Kühe der Frühlingslevels.
description.spanish: ¡Salva a todas las vacas en los niveles primaverales del modo Historia!
description.french: Sauvez toutes les vaches sur tous les niveaux du printemps.
description.italian: Salva tutte le mucche di ogni livello di Storia primaverile.
description.dutch: Red alle koeien tijdens elk level van het verhaal tijdens de lente.
description.brazilian: Salve todas as vacas em todos os níveis do modo história da primavera.
description.swedish: Rädda alla kor i alla berättelsenivåer under våren.

description.english: Save all the cows on every level of the Story mode in Veteran difficulty.
description.german: Rette alle Kühe in allen Levels des Story-Modus mit Veteranen-Schwierigkeitsstufe.
description.french: Sauvez toutes les vaches du mode Histoire en niveau de difficulté Vétéran.
description.italian: Salva tutte le mucche di ogni livello in modalità Storia con livello di difficoltà Veterano.
description.spanish: Salva a todas las vacas en todos los niveles del modo Historia en dificultad Veterano.
description.dutch: Red alle koeien tijdens elk level van het verhaal in Veteraanmodus.
description.swedish: Rädda alla kor på alla nivåer i berättelseläge på veteransvårighet.
description.brazilian: Salve todas as vacas em todos os níveis do modo história no modo veterano.

description.english: Save all the cows throughout all the Challenges.
description.german: Rette alle Kühe in allen Challenges.
description.spanish: Salva a todas las vacas en todos los desafíos.

description.dutch: Red alle koeien in alle uitdagingen.
description.brazilian: Salve todas as vacas por todos os desafios.
description.swedish: Rädda alla kor under alla utmaningar.

description.german: Rette alle Kühe in der Challenge-Kategorie 'Seltsame Wissenschaft'.

description.brazilian: Salve todas as vacas pela categoria desafio Ciência estranha.

description.german: Rette alle Kühe in der Challenge-Kategorie 'Hardrock vom roten Planeten'.
description.french: Sauvez toutes les vaches sur l'ensemble des Challenges "Peur sur le Hellfest"

description.brazilian: Salve todas as vacas pela categoria desafio Hard rock do planeta vermelho.
description.swedish: Rädda alla kor under hela utmaningskategorin Metal från den röda planeten.

displayName.english: They're coming to get you, Barbra!
displayName.german: Sie kommen, um dich zu holen, Barbara!
displayName.brazilian: Eles estão vindo para pegar você, Bárbara!
displayName.swedish: De kommer för att ta dig Barbra!

description.english: Save all the cows throughout the whole 'Zombies of Mars' Challenge category.

description.brazilian: Salve todas as vacas pela categoria desafio Zumbis de Marte.

displayName.english: I MAID A GAM3 W1TH M4RT1ANS!!!1

displayName.dutch: IK HEB EEN SPEL GECREËERD MET M4RSM4NNETJES!!!

description.english: Save all the cows throughout the whole 'Ninjas in the Snow' Challenge category.
description.german: Rette alle Kühe in der Challenge-Kategorie 'Ninjas im Schnee'.
description.french: Sauvez toutes les vaches sur l'ensemble des Challenges "Les Ninjas qui venaient du froid"
description.italian: Salva tutte le mucche nella categoria Sfida "Ninja nella neve".
description.spanish: Salva a todas las vacas de la categoría de desafíos "Ninjas en la nieve".

description.brazilian: Salve todas as vacas pela categoria desafio Ninjas na neve.

description.english: Save all the cows throughout the whole 'Back to Basics' Challenge category.
description.german: Rette alle Kühe in der Challenge-Kategorie 'Zurück zu den Wurzeln'.
description.french: Sauvez toutes les vaches sur l'ensemble des Challenges "Retour aux Sources"
description.italian: Salva tutte le mucche nella categoria "Ritorno all'essenziale".
description.spanish: Salva a todas las vacas de la categoría de desafíos "Vuelta a los orígenes".
description.dutch: Red alle koeien tijdens de volledige 'Terug naar de Basis'-uitdagingscategorie.
description.brazilian: Salve todas as vacas pela categoria desafio De volta ao básico.
description.swedish: Rädda alla kor under hela utmaningskategorin Börja om från grunden.

description.english: Blast at least 8 Martians with one Bomb!
description.german: Jage mindestens 8 Marsianer mit einer Bombe in die Luft!
description.spanish: ¡Haz volar por los aires a 8 marcianos o más con una bomba!
description.french: Éliminez 8 Martiens ou plus avec une seule Brico-Bombe !
description.italian: Fai saltare in aria almeno 8 Marziani con una bomba!
description.dutch: Raak minstens 8 marsmannetjes met één bom!
description.brazilian: Exploda pelo menos 8 marcianos com uma bomba!
description.swedish: Spräng minst 8 marsianer med en bomb!

displayName.french: Les bons Engrenages ne rouillent pas
displayName.italian: Gli ingranaggi buoni non arrugginiscono mai

description.english: Defeat a Winter Story level without letting one Cog disappear.
description.german: Spiele ein Winterlevel im Story-Modus, ohne ein Zahnrad verschwinden zu lassen.
description.spanish: Supera un nivel invernal del modo Historia sin perder ni una sola rueda dentada.
description.french: Survivez à un niveau d'hiver du mode Histoire sans laisser disparaître le moindre Engrenage.
description.italian: Supera il livello Storia invernale senza far sparire gli Ingranaggi.
description.dutch: Voltooi een verhaallevel in de winter zonder een tandwiel te laten verdwijnen.
description.brazilian: Derrote um nível história do inverno sem deixar nenhuma engrenagem desaparecer.
description.swedish: Klara en vinterberättelsenivå utan att låta ett kugghjul försvinna.

description.english: Behold a Cow going through a quantum wormhole!
description.german: Halte nach einer Kuh Ausschau, die durch ein Quantenwurmloch geht!
description.spanish: ¡Contempla a una vaca atravesar un agujero de gusano espacio-temporal cuántico!
description.french: Une vache a emprunté un tunnel quantique.
description.italian: Guarda, una mucca che passa attraverso un cunicolo spazio-temporale quantico!
description.dutch: Jeminee, een koe die door een kwantumwormgat gaat!
description.brazilian: Veja uma vaca passando por um furo quântico!
description.swedish: Se en ko gå igenom ett kvantum-maskhål!

description.english: Successfully start a chain reaction using 4 or more Explosive Barrels!
description.german: Starte eine Kettenreaktion mit 4 oder mehr explosiven Fässern!
description.spanish: ¡Desata una reacción en cadena con 4 o más barriles explosivos!
description.french: Produisez une réaction en chaîne entre au moins quatre Barils Explosifs !
description.italian: Innesca con successo una reazione a catena con 4 o più Barili esplosivi!
description.dutch: Creëer een kettingreactie door 4 of meer explosieve tonnen te gebruiken!
description.brazilian: Faça uma reação em corrente usando 4 ou mais barris explosivos.
description.swedish: Starta framgångsrikt en kedjereaktion med 4 eller fler explosiva tunnor!

displayName.english: When you have to shoot, shoot! Don't Talk!
displayName.french: Quand on tire on raconte pas sa vie !
displayName.italian: Quando devi sparare, spara! Non parlare!
displayName.dutch: Als je moet schieten, schiet! Niks zeggen!
displayName.brazilian: Quando tiver que fazer, faça-o sem conversa!
displayName.swedish: När du måste skjuta, skjut! Prata inte!

description.english: Use the Zapper to finish a Martian.
description.german: Erledige einen Marsianer mit der Laserpistole.
description.spanish: Usa la pistola láser para acabar con un marciano.
description.french: Achevez un Martien au Zapper.
description.italian: Usa la Pistola laser per finire un Marziano.
description.dutch: Gebruik de stroomstoter om met een marsmannetje af te rekenen.
description.brazilian: Use o Zapper para apagar um marciano.
description.swedish: Oskadliggör en marsian med zapparen.

displayName.english: GLaDOS is not gonna be glad!
displayName.german: GLaDOS wird nicht gerade glücklich sein!
displayName.spanish: ¡A GLaDOS no le va a gustar!
displayName.french: GLaDOS risque de ne pas apprécier
displayName.swedish: GLaDOS kommer inte att bli glad!

description.english: Witness or cause the collapse of a quantum wormhole.
description.german: Verursache den Zusammenbruch eines Quantenwurmlochs oder sei zumindest dabei.
description.spanish: Presencia o provoca el cierre de un agujero espacio-temporal cuántico.
description.french: Provoquez ou assistez à l'effondrement d'un tunnel quantique.
description.italian: Osserva o provoca il crollo di un cunicolo spazio-temporale quantico.
description.dutch: Aanschouw of veroorzaak de ineenstorting van een kwantumwormgat.
description.brazilian: Testemunhe ou cause um colapso com o furo quântico.
description.swedish: Bevittna eller orsaka kollapsen av ett kvantum-maskhål.

displayName.spanish: La pistola de rayos de Checkhov

description.english: Someone's gotta fire it before the end.
description.german: Jemand muss sie vor dem Ende abfeuern.
description.spanish: Alguien tiene que dispararla hasta el final.
description.french: Il n'est pas là que pour la décoration.
description.italian: Qualcuno deve sparargli prima della fine.
description.dutch: Iemand moet ermee schieten voor het einde.
description.brazilian: Alguém precisa atirar com isto antes do fim.
description.swedish: Någon måste avfyra den innan dramat är över.

description.english: Survive all five 'This is Halloween!' bonus levels!
description.german: Überlebe alle "Das ist Halloween!"-Bonuslevels!
description.french: Remportez les cinq niveaux bonus "C'est ça Halloween !" !
description.italian: Sopravvivi a tutti e cinque i livelli bonus "Questo è Halloween!"
description.spanish: ¡Sobrevive a los cinco niveles de bonificación "¡Esto es Halloween!"!
description.dutch: Overleef alle vijf de 'Dit is Halloween!' bonus levels!
description.swedish: Överlev alla fem bonusnivåerna i "Det här är halloween!".
description.brazilian: Sobreviva todos os cinco níveis bônus de "É o dia das bruxas!"

displayName.spanish: ¿Miedo? Tú no sabes aún lo que es el miedo...

description.english: Save all the cows on all the 'This is Halloween!' bonus levels.
description.german: Rette alle Kühe in allen "Das ist Halloween!"-Bonuslevels.
description.french: Sauvez toutes les vaches sur l'ensemble des niveaux bonus "C'est ça Halloween !" !
description.italian: Salva tutte le mucche in tutti i livelli bonus "Questo è Halloween!"
description.spanish: ¡Salva a todas las vacas en los cinco niveles de bonificación "¡Esto es Halloween!"!
description.dutch: Red alle koeien tijdens de 'Dit is Halloween!'-bonuslevels!
description.swedish: Rädda alla kor på alla bonusnivåerna i "Det här är halloween!".
description.brazilian: Salve todas as vacas dos níveis bônus de "É o dia das bruxas!"

description.english: Save all the cows on all the 'This is Halloween!' bonus levels in Veteran difficulty.
description.german: Rette alle Kühe in allen "Das ist Halloween!"-Bonuslevels im Veteranen-Modus.
description.french: Sauvez toutes les vaches sur l'ensemble des niveaux bonus "C'est ça Halloween !" en mode Vétéran !
description.italian: Salva tutte le mucche in tutti i livelli bonus "Questo è Halloween!" con livello di difficoltà Veterano.
description.spanish: ¡Salva a todas las vacas en los cinco niveles de bonificación "¡Esto es Halloween!" en dificultad Veterano!
description.dutch: Red alle koeien tijdens de 'Dit is Halloween!'-bonuslevels in de Veteraanmodus!
description.swedish: Rädda alla kor på alla bonusnivåerna i "Det här är halloween!" på veteransvårighet!
description.brazilian: Salve todas as vacas dos níveis bônus de "É o dia das bruxas!" no modo veterano.

displayName.english: Ain't that a cute little gun?
displayName.german: Ist das nicht eine niedliche Knarre?
displayName.french: C'est pas beau p'tit flingue, ça ?
displayName.italian: Ma guarda che piccola arma adorabile!
displayName.swedish: Men det var väl en söt liten pistol!
displayName.brazilian: Essa não é uma arma bonitinha?

description.english: Survive all five 'Meet the Martians' bonus levels!
description.german: Überlebe alle "Triff die Marsianer"-Bonuslevels!
description.french: Remportez les cinq niveaux bonus "À la rencontre des Martiens" !
description.italian: Sopravvivi a tutti e cinque i livelli bonus "Scopri i Marziani"
description.spanish: ¡Sobrevive a los cinco niveles de bonificación "Conoce a los marcianos"!
description.dutch: Overleef alle vijf de 'Maak kennis met de marsmannetjes' bonus levels!
description.swedish: Överlev alla fem bonusnivåerna i "Möt marsianerna".
description.brazilian: Sobreviva todos os cinco níveis bônus de "Conheça os marcianos"

displayName.french: Pour le bien de la science, sale monstre.
displayName.italian: Per il bene della scienza... mostro.
displayName.spanish: Por el bien de la ciencia, monstruo

description.english: Save all the cows on all the 'Meet the Martians' bonus levels.
description.german: Rette alle Kühe in allen "Triff die Marsianer"-Bonuslevels.
description.french: Sauvez toutes les vaches sur l'ensemble des niveaux bonus "À la rencontre des Martiens" !
description.italian: Salva tutte le mucche in tutti i livelli bonus "Scopri i Marziani"
description.spanish: ¡Salva a todas las vacas en los cinco niveles de bonificación "Conoce a los marcianos"!
description.dutch: Red alle koeien tijdens de 'Maak kennis met de marsmannetjes'-bonuslevels!
description.swedish: Rädda alla kor på alla bonusnivåerna i "Möt marsianerna".
description.brazilian: Salve todas as vacas dos níveis bônus de "Conheça os marcianos"

displayName.german: Wir können nicht bis drei zählen.
displayName.french: Mars ne sait pas compter jusqu'à trois.
displayName.italian: I Marziani non sanno contare fino a tre.
displayName.spanish: Los marcianos no saben contar hasta tres
displayName.swedish: Marsianer kan inte räkna till tre.

description.english: Save all the cows on all the 'Meet the Martians' bonus levels in Veteran difficulty.
description.german: Rette alle Kühe in allen "Triff die Marsianer"-Bonuslevels im Veteranen-Modus.
description.french: Sauvez toutes les vaches sur l'ensemble des niveaux bonus "À la rencontre des Martiens" en mode Vétéran !
description.italian: Salva tutte le mucche in tutti i livelli bonus "Scopri i Marziani" con livello di difficoltà Veterano.
